summary: This is the Present of my main chacarter Monique, a female Ningheim. UNP, CBBE
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]I took these Screenshots with Poupouri ENB :) I am currently using K ENB Pure Light ^^

Hello, this is my Present for my main character Monique, since a few people requested it :)
She belongs to the Ningheim Race and her Body is UNP, Weight 0, but it should work with CBBE fine as well.

[i]For her Outfit:[/i] Ashara Elven Knight Armor (only the leggins), TERA Armors (Shadow Fang)

Highly Required Mods(to achieve the exact same look):

INSTALL IN ORDER and overwrite if asked

[/size][list][*][size=4]SKSE[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3]Racemenu[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]RaceComnpability with Fixes[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]RaceMenu Skeleton Sliders
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]XP32 Maximum Skeleton
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]UNP Body /CBBE Bodies
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]UNP Texture Blender (only with UNP)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]The Ningheim Race[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]No More Blocky Faces[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Better Females By Bella
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Smile in HD[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]No More Ugly Bronze Shine
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]KS Hairdos 265[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]The Eyes Of Beauty
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Better Makeup for SKSE[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]SG female Texture Renewal
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Mature Skin[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]SG Female Eyebrows[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Optional: Facelight[/size]
[/*]
[/list]
[size=3]
[u]How To Install:[/u]
The Installation Is very easy and should not take much time.
[i]1st[/i]
Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
[i]2nd[/i]
If you haven't saved any Character Presents yet, this folder may be empty, but just put my file [i]0.slot[/i] in there, this contains Moniques Present. [b]Overwrite if asked.[/b]
[i]3rd[/i]
Then open your game and go into the RaceMenu (open console by ^ and type in showracemenu, enter), there at the bottom you should be able to see Load Present (F5). Press that and your character willÂ  load up. It should look like mine, if not I'm sorry.

I made thsi mod for fun and i hope you enjoy :)
- Fiona
[/size][size=3]
[/size]
author: Fiona
